description: Write a function that parses a URL, extracts its hostname, and checks if it matches any string in the `definitions` list (case-insensitive). `definitions` is a NULL-terminated array. Example (Match): is_url_hostname_in_list("http://LocalHost/", ["localhost", "127.0.0.1", NULL]) -> 1. Example (No Match): is_url_hostname_in_list("http://google.com/", ["localhost", "127.0.0.1", NULL]) -> 0.
